reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 346/98: SECOND INSTALMENT PAYMENT OF SCHOOL TAXES IN 1998
reg_info.reg_name_text: SECOND INSTALMENT PAYMENT OF SCHOOL TAXES IN 1998

content.content: 1. The time for paying instalments referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act is extended to October 30, 1998. O. Reg. 346/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 500/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time for paying instalments referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act is extended to October 30, 1998. O. Reg. 346/98, s. 1; O. Reg. 500/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Instalments referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act shall be paid to the Province rather than to boards. O. Reg. 346/98, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Instalments referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act shall be paid to the Province rather than to boards. O. Reg. 346/98, s. 2.

Français
